name: spotify_search
description: Search for songs, albums, and artists on Spotify. Returns matching tracks, artists, and albums with names and metadata.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query (song name, artist, album, or any combination)

steps.label: Wait for search results to load

steps.code: const tracks = []; const trackRows = document.querySelectorAll('[data-testid="tracklist-row"], [data-testid="search-tracks-result"] [data-testid="tracklist-row"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(trackRows.length, 10); i++) { const row = trackRows[i]; const nameEl = row.querySelector('[data-testid="internal-track-link"], .encore-text a, a[href^="/track"]'); const artistEl = row.querySelector('a[href^="/artist"]'); const imgEl = row.querySelector('img'); tracks.push({ name: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : '', artist: artistEl ? artistEl.textContent.trim() : '', image: imgEl ? imgEl.src : '', link: nameEl ? nameEl.href || '' : '' }); } const artists = []; const artistCards = document.querySelectorAll('[data-testid="search-category-card"] a[href^="/artist"], section a[href^="/artist"]'); const seenArtists = new Set(); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(artistCards.length, 5); i++) { const card = artistCards[i]; const name = card.textContent.trim(); if (name && !seenArtists.has(name)) { seenArtists.add(name); artists.push({ name: name, link: card.href || '' }); } } const albums = []; const albumCards = document.querySelectorAll('section a[href^="/album"]'); const seenAlbums = new Set(); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(albumCards.length, 5); i++) { const card = albumCards[i]; const name = card.textContent.trim(); if (name && !seenAlbums.has(name)) { seenAlbums.add(name); albums.push({ name: name, link: card.href || '' }); } } return { query: '{{query}}', track_count: tracks.length, artist_count: artists.length, album_count: albums.length, tracks: tracks, artists: artists, albums: albums }
steps.name: search_results
steps.label: Extract search results
